tokens.text: validates entity type definitions and format versions

title: Entity Type
description: Validates entity type definitions in behavior packs. Checks format_version against the current Minecraft version and can update format versions to the latest.

fields.title: Runtime Identifier
fields.description: Aggregates runtime_identifier values from entity type definitions. Runtime identifiers inherit behavior from vanilla entities.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the runtime_identifier string.

fields.title: Entity Identifier
fields.description: Aggregates identifier values from entity type definitions. Shows which vanilla entity identifiers are being overridden.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the entity identifier string.

fields.title: Entity Metadata
fields.description: Aggregates metadata about entity types including aliases and properties defined in entity descriptions.

fields.title: Format Version Undefined
fields.description: Checks that the entity type definition has a format_version field defined.
fields.howToUse: Add a format_version field to the root of your entity JSON file. Example: "format_version": "1.21.0". Use the latest Minecraft version number.

fields.title: Major Version Low
fields.description: The entity type format_version major version is lower than the current Minecraft version. Consider updating to access new features.
fields.howToUse: Update the format_version to use the latest Minecraft version. You can use the 'Fix' button to automatically update this, or manually change it in the JSON file.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Major Version High
fields.description: The entity type format_version major version is higher than the current Minecraft version. This indicates an invalid future version.
fields.howToUse: Lower the format_version to match the current Minecraft version. Future versions are not supported. Check docs.microsoft.com for the latest valid version.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Minor Version Low
fields.description: The entity type format_version minor version is lower than the current Minecraft version. Consider updating for compatibility.
fields.howToUse: Update the format_version minor version to the current Minecraft version. Use the 'Fix' button for automatic update.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Minor Version High
fields.description: The entity type format_version minor version is higher than the current Minecraft version. This indicates an invalid future version.
fields.howToUse: The minor version is ahead of the current Minecraft release. Update to a valid current version.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Patch Version Low
fields.description: The entity type format_version patch version is lower than the current Minecraft version. Consider updating for the latest fixes.
fields.howToUse: Update the format_version patch number to the current version. This ensures you have the latest bug fixes and features.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Patch Version High
fields.description: The entity type format_version patch version is higher than the current Minecraft version. This indicates an invalid future version.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack entity type format to latest version.

fields.title: Version Retrieval Failed
fields.description: Internal error: Could not retrieve the latest Minecraft version from the database.

fields.title: Version Parse Failed
fields.description: Internal error: Could not parse the latest Minecraft version string into version components.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the version string that failed to parse.
